Uses of Class
co.codecraft.jcircuit.TransitionPolicy

    • Uses of TransitionPolicy in co.codecraft.jcircuit

      Subclasses of TransitionPolicy in co.codecraft.jcircuit 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DirectTransitionPolicy
      Does nothing in response to events, allowing transitions to be controlled solely by calls to CircuitBreaker.directTransition(int, boolean).
      class  TimedRatioPolicy
      Provides a simple transition policy where all rules are expressed in terms of ratios of good and bad pulses, calculated at regularly timed intervals.
      Fields in co.codecraft.jcircuit declared as TransitionPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      TransitionPolicy CircuitBreaker.transitionPolicy
      Implements transition decisions for this circuit breaker.
      Constructors in co.codecraft.jcircuit with parameters of type TransitionPolicy 
      Constructor and Description
      CircuitBreaker(TransitionPolicy policy, Circuit.Listener listener)
      Create a new CircuitBreaker that transitions per the specified policy.
